amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that human dosing studies of pesticides raises ethical and health questions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2186 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2186 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14520-14524) To express the sense of the Senate that human dosing studies of pesticides raises ethical and health questions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2186 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2186 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 2150.
